songs.title: Shut Up And Love Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Demi Lovato]
We were fine this morning
Now I feel like I'm dreaming
You try to tell me what's happened
But I can't hear when you're screaming
Oh-oh

[Pe-Chorus: Demi Lovato]
No more "I'm sorry"s
I don't have the time
You break up to make up
So spare me the lines

[Chorus: Demi Lovato]
Shut up and love me
Because you've already got me
I don't need words
I need time in your arms
I need love from you, baby

[Verse 2: Demi Lovato]
You know it's not right
We could've been smiling
You should've seen the light
Inside my eyes
And I shouldn't have been crying
Oh, no

[Pre-Chorus: Demi Lovato]
Don't say you need me
Don't promise to change
I know that you mean it
There's nothing to say

[Chorus: Demi Lovato]
Shut up and love me
Because you've already got me
I don't need words
I need time in your arms
I need love from you, baby
Oh-oh

[Outro: Demi Lovato]
Oh, just shut up and love me
Because you've already got me
I don't need words
And as much as it hurts
I need love from you, baby

[Bridge: Demi Lovato]
And how can you be
Too blind to see
The girl who stands before you
Who wants you more than anything

[Chorus: Demi Lovato]
Shut up and love me
Because you've already got me
I don't need words
I need time in your arms
I need love from you, baby

[Outro: Demi Lovato]
Oh, just shut up and love me
Because you've already got me
I don't need words
And as much as it hurts
I need love from you, baby
